title: Most popular Belgium-based influencers on Instagram 2019
summary: In 2019 , angele_vl_(Angèle_stage_name_of_Angèle_Van_Laeken) was the Most popular Instagram User at 2488193 followers .
Currently in its seventh generation , it was first followers in 1979 and had been popular with Instagram consumers from the beginning .
Two years after its introduction on the market , the angele_vl_(Angèle_stage_name_of_Angèle_Van_Laeken) Mk1 had already reached the peak of the most followers supermini cars .

data.Instagram User: angele vl (Angèle stage name of Angèle Van Laeken)

gold: In December 2019 , singer-songwriter Angèle had the most followers of all Belgian influencers on Instagram.
This according to data provided by InfluencerDB.
The musician had several hit songs in 2018 , including number one hit Tout Oublier in Belgium and France with her brother Romeo Elvis ( fourth in this ranking ) .
